definition: to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
on the aisle (referring to seats on a plane etc)

sentences.english: We see small children 25)bouncing up and down and 26)hollering with joy on the rope walkway.
sentences.chinese: 我們看見小孩們上下蹦跳，在繩索走道上歡樂地叫喊。

sentences.english: The penguins' burrows are commonly found under the boardwalks.
sentences.chinese: 在木板走道下可以發現許多企鵝的洞穴。

sentences.english: Dense Rainforest seen from Canopy Walkway.
sentences.chinese: 從天篷走道被見到的密集的雨林。

sentences.english: Many kinds of woodland can be seen on the various walks which radiate from the Heritage Centre.
sentences.chinese: 從遺產中心向外伸展的各條走道上可以看到多種林地。

sentences.english: An aisle facing the entrance went thought the building.
sentences.chinese: 正中間還有走道穿樓而過，面對着進來的大道。

sentences.english: Go all the way to the back and turn right, Aisle 8.
sentences.chinese: 往裏頭走到盡頭，右轉，在第8走道。

sentences.english: An aisle facing to the entrance went thought the building.
sentences.chinese: 正中間還有走道穿樓而過，面對着進來的大道。

definition: head of a flight of stairs
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
